title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with one command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, and manage local models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; simple chat & generate calls, embeddings, model management, streaming support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama; drop-in LLM and chat model wrappers for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now named Open WebUI); chat history, model switching, RAG uploads, admin panel.

title: ollama4j – Java Ollama Client
summary: Unofficial Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; synchronous & reactive APIs, model management, streaming support.

title: ollama-rb – Ruby gem
summary: Unofficial Ruby client for Ollama; idiomatic wrappers for chat, generate, pull, and delete operations.

title: ollama-cli (rust) – cross-platform CLI
summary: Rust-based CLI that wraps Ollama REST endpoints with coloured output, history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot – VS Code extension
summary: Neovim plugin that adds Ollama-powered code completion, inline chat, and explain features via CodeCompanion.

title: ollama-helm – Kubernetes Helm charts
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with PVC, GPU node-selector, and autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker – Official Docker image
summary: Official container image for Ollama server; CPU and CUDA variants, multi-arch (amd64/arm64).

title: ollama-haystack – Haystack integration
summary: Haystack 2.x integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator for pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp – .NET client
summary: Unofficial C# client for Ollama with async chat, generate, model management, and streaming support.

title: ollama-rag – Minimal RAG example
summary: Python repo showing how to build a retrieval-augmented generation pipeline with Ollama, Chroma, and LangChain.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot that replies using Ollama models; supports slash commands, conversation memory, and model switching.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that streams Ollama responses into threads; per-channel model selection and admin controls.

title: ollama-obsidian – Obsidian plugin
summary: Obsidian community plugin to run Ollama models inside notes for summarization, translation, and continuation.

title: ollama-npm – Unofficial JS wrapper
summary: Lightweight npm package that wraps Ollama REST endpoints for Node and browsers with fetch-only dependency.

title: ollama-py – PyPI mirror
summary: Official PyPI package name for ollama-python; install via pip install ollama.

title: ollama-reddit discussion – Local LLM ecosystem
summary: Reddit thread collecting new Ollama tools, UI wrappers, and integrations from the community.
